Using the Extension

1. Open sidebar

The extension mainly consists of a sidebar. To highlight parts of a webpage, first you have to open the sidebar (called SCY-Sidebar). You have to open the context-menu by right-clicking (windows) into your browser-frame and select “SCY-Sidebar”. Alternatively you can use the shortcut “Ctrl + Shift + E”

2. Highlight Selection

Draw a selection on any webpage and open the context-menu on this selection (right-clicking on windows), choose “Highlight Selection”. The Text will be highlighted (yellow) and a menuitem and a source appears in the sidebar. Alternatively you can drag and drop the text to the summary-box in the sidebar. You can also drag and drop images (not links to images!) into the sidebar (target is also the summary-box). Of Course, these actions are only available, when the sidebar is not hidden!

3. Delete Selections

Open the context-menu on the selection you want to delete and choose “De-Highlight Selection” from the popup. Alternatively you can select (multiple) items in the summary-box and click the “Remove Selection” button below the summary-box.

4. Preview Summary

If you want to see an html-representation of the whole summary, click the “Preview!”-button on the bottom of the sidebar-content. A new window is opened, which previews the summary, including the images (if you have dragged some to the summary-box).

5. Print Summary

The generated summary can also be printed by a connected printing device. Click the "Print" button to start it.

6. Save ELO

You can export the ELO to a webserver and use it later in SCYLab by the tool "Webresourcer".
